title: "Fractal Wallpapers"
content:
Welcome to our website, where you can find a stunning collection of fractal wallpapers for your desktop or mobile device. Our unique collection features abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set, in a monochromatic color scheme that is both elegant and modern.

Our wallpapers are perfect for anyone who wants to add a touch of sophistication to their digital devices. Whether you're looking for a bold statement piece or something more subtle, we have a wallpaper that will suit your style.

All of our wallpapers are available in high resolution, so you can enjoy every detail of the intricate patterns. And with new designs added regularly, you'll always find something fresh and exciting to update your screen.

So why settle for a boring, generic wallpaper when you can have something truly unique and beautiful? Browse our collection today and find the perfect fractal wallpaper for your device!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a repeating pattern of abstract shapes inspired by the Mandelbrot set, in a monochromatic color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
